data.title: Work Truck
data.meta_description: Serves the specialized needs of the light and medium-duty truck, van and SUV fleets. Our print and digital magazine and website provide all levels of fleet and operations management news, tools and expert advice that is essential to managing these highly diverse vehicle and equipment assets.
data.meta_site_name: Bobit - Business Intelligently™ with innovative marketing solutions for Growth
data.text:
Serving the entire car and truck rental industry including headquarters, airport, local car and truck, independents and franchised agencies. Our magazine, enewsletter and website deliver targeted rental industry news and coverage of important initiatives and trends.

Serving all segments involved in the fleet management of 25 or more vehicles for commercial and government fleets. Since 1961 we have provided authoritative news and insight to the fleet management market. Our print and digital magazine, webinars, eNewsletters, and website provide up-to-the-minute industry news.

Serving the segments involved in the fleet management of 10-50 vehicles for the commercial sector. Business Fleet’s eNewsletter, and website provide news and information that address the unique needs and concerns of this fleet segment.

Charged Fleet spans the full spectrum of the EV ecosystem. Providing fleet decision-makers in commercial and public sector fleets with class 1-8 vehicles – with the most essential news and insights on vehicles, battery & charging technology, maintenance, manufacturing, purchase & leasing information, and regulatory & compliance issues – Charged Fleet is where fleet EV buying decisions are nurtured and made.

Serving the key decision-makers responsible for government fleets at the federal, state and local levels. Our print and digital magazine, webinars, enewsletter and website provide government related news and analysis for the fleet management professional.

HDT connects with trucking fleet owners, managers, & executives overseeing 14 million+ trucks, tractors, vans, and 3.7 million+ trailers.

Serving the bus. rail, public transportation, and motorcoach industry for over 100 years, METRO has been the undisputed authoritative voice in the public transportation market offering an expansive platform of cutting-edge digital media options in addition to an industry-leading legacy print publication. These media assets inform and educate our audience while connecting industry buyers and sellers.

Serving the ever-evolving school bus and pupil transportation segment for over 50 years, School Bus Fleet is the undisputed voice in the student transportation market. Offering an expansive platform of cutting-edge digital media options and industry-leading print publications, School Bus Fleet’s media assets inform and educate public and private school transportation professionals while connecting industry buyers and sellers.

Serving the automotive needs of the remarketing industry with our annual event C.A.R. Conference. This key industry event brings together fleet management companies, lessors, auto manufacturers plus captive finance companies and banks.
